3501.verse: وَإِذَا|And when|85|94|96$غَشِيَهُم|covers them|102|120|11544$مَّوْجٌ|a wave|68|86|12591$كَٱلظُّلَلِ|like canopies,|109|127|13851$دَعَوُاْ|they call|77|95|8084$ٱللَّهَ|Allah,|56|74|184$مُخْلِصِينَ|(being) sincere|119|128|6352$لَهُ|to Him|62|69|1807$ٱلدِّينَ|(in) religion.|99|114|1208$فَلَمَّا|But when|82|97|141$نَجَّـٰهُمْ|He delivers them|130|145|13677$إِلَى|to|53|68|118$ٱلْبَرِّ|the land|74|89|5263$فَمِنْهُم|then among them|136|143|2258$مُّقْتَصِدٌ‌ۚ|(some are) moderate.|164|176|13852$وَمَا|And not|72|96|46$يَجْحَدُ|deny|73|97|13657$بِـَٔـايَـٰتِنَآ|Our Signs|83|107|408$إِلَّا|except|65|89|86$كُلُّ|every|57|81|575$خَتَّارٍ|traitor|68|80|13853$كَفُورٍ|ungrateful.|92|92|12103$

3498.verse: Do you not see that Allah causes the night to enter the day and causes the day to enter the night and has subjected the sun and the moon, each running [its course] for a specified term, and that Allah, with whatever you do, is Acquainted?

3499.verse: That is because Allah is the Truth, and that what they call upon other than Him is falsehood, and because Allah is the Most High, the Grand.

3500.verse: Do you not see that ships sail through the sea by the favor of Allah that He may show you of His signs? Indeed in that are signs for everyone patient and grateful.

3501.verse: And when waves come over them like canopies, they supplicate Allah, sincere to Him in religion. But when He delivers them to the land, there are [some] of them who are moderate [in faith]. And none rejects Our signs except everyone treacherous and ungrateful.

3502.verse: O mankind, fear your Lord and fear a Day when no father will avail his son, nor will a son avail his father at all. Indeed, the promise of Allah is truth, so let not the worldly life delude you and be not deceived about Allah by the Deceiver.

3503.verse: Indeed, Allah [alone] has knowledge of the Hour and sends down the rain and knows what is in the wombs. And no soul perceives what it will earn tomorrow, and no soul perceives in what land it will die. Indeed, Allah is Knowing and Acquainted.
